A

AdminState - Class in view
Substate that the LoginState enters when the user enters "admin" in the login.

C

CaptionEditSubstate - Class in view
Substate that the PhotoViewState enters when the user is editing the caption of a selected Photo.

Helper method to center image to the middle of the image view.
currentUser - Variable in class view.LoginState
Sets currentUser to the User that logs into the application.

enter() - Method in class view.AdminState
Method that sets the AdminState to visible.

Sets up required buttons and the caption area.

Accessed when logging out of the NonAdminState.

Accessed when logged in from LoginState or leaving the PhotoViewState.

Called when entering the state.
enter() - Method in class view.PhotoViewState
Accessed when opening an album from NonAdminState.
enter() - Method in class view.SlideShowState
Empty enter method.

Helper method to set the photo list view to the current album's photos.
loadTags() - Method in class view.PhotoViewState
Helper method to load the current tags and tag types of the current user.
LoginState - Class in view
Initial substate that the application will enter when application is launched.

N

NonAdminState - Class in view
Substate that the LoginState enters when the user enters a valid username in the login.

O

openAlbum(Album) - Method in class view.NonAdminState
Takes the selected album and sets it as the current album in PhotoViewState, then transitions to PhotoViewState.

P

Reference to the singleton instance of PhotoController.
PhotoState - Class in view
